<a name="2.0.0"></a>
# 2.0.0 (2015-07-19)

* Support YAML's specification. e.g. 'y/n', 'on/off'
    * http://yaml.org/type/bool.html
    * Breaking change!


### Features

* **specification:** support yaml specification ([d4ef6e4](https://github.com/sanemat/node-boolify-string/commit/d4ef6e4))
